oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pepper-Tanner - Country and Western Library promo - 1970
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a promotional tape for the Pepper-Tanner Country and Western Library subscription, made for country music month in 1970.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement for the Pepper-Tanner Country & Western Library -- [Unidentified] promotes the Pepper-Tanner Country & Western Library -- [Unidentified] talks about the genre of the library -- [Unidentified] talks about some examples for the libraries uses with various businesses -- [Unidentified] talks about some examples for the libraries uses with various holidays -- [Unidentified] talks about examples for the libraries uses with sales -- [Unidentified] shows some country star promos in the library -- [Unidentified] shows off some of the libraries uses for radio stations and sports casts -- [Unidentified] shows off some of the libraries program tag lines -- [Unidentified] shows some of the libraries sound effects -- [Unidentified] talks about pricing for the library subscription -- Closing statement
